case.title: Break on change in
case.description: The break expression that determines when to begin a new group.

case.title: Label
case.description: The label that identifies the group field on the report.

case.title: Order on break
case.description: Orders the groups of the report using the values of the break expression.

case.title: Use set ordering
case.description: Orders the groups of the report using the sort order of the table or set.

case.title: Specify order
case.description: Allow you to specify an expression that orders the groups of the report.

case.title: Ascending Descending
case.description: Specifies whether the groups will be sorted in ascending or descending order.

case.title: Group keep
case.description: Specifies that all detail records in a group must be kept together on a page.

case.title: Group on new page
case.description: Specifies that each group starts on a new column.

case.title: Columns in group
case.description: Overrides the report level setting for columns.

case.title: Balance column height
case.description: Indicates whether column heights should be balanced. Overrides the report level setting.

case.title: Has group header
case.description: Indicates whether the group has a group header.

case.title: Repeats at page/group break
case.description: Indicates whether the group header repeats at page and group breaks.

case.title: Keep with detail
case.description: Indicates that the group header must be followed by at least one detail record.

case.title: Has Page Header
case.description: Overrides the report level setting for Page Header for the current group.

case.title: Has Continuation Header
case.description: Overrides the report level setting for Page Continuation Header for the current group.

case.title: Has group footer
case.description: Indicates whether the group has a group footer.

case.title: Repeats at page/group break
case.description: Indicates whether the group footer repeats at page and group breaks.

case.title: Keep with detail
case.description: Indicates that the group footer must be preceded by at least one detail record.

case.title: Has Page Footer
case.description: Overrides the report level setting for Page Footer for the current group.

case.title: Has Continuation Footer
case.description: Overrides the report level setting for Page Continuation Footer for the current group.
